analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/24/0x9fa4ef320eeeec0ab5cdeab55aa520e3a050204d.sol:
	Contract Otest1Token has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/24/0x9fa4ef320eeeec0ab5cdeab55aa520e3a050204d.sol#235-236)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/24/0x9fa4ef320eeeec0ab5cdeab55aa520e3a050204d.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.23 (/unique_chucks/24/0x9fa4ef320eeeec0ab5cdeab55aa520e3a050204d.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/24/0x9fa4ef320eeeec0ab5cdeab55aa520e3a050204d.sol#80-81) is not in mixedCase
